mint.title: Mint
mint.covered_amount_tooltip: The remaining amount of VNST support users if the exchange rate experiences price impact beyond the covered price
mint.fee_tooltip: The cost for processing VNST minting transaction
mint.covered_price_tooltip:
Supported price range during VNST minting to mitigate the impact of VMM exchange rate decreases beyond Y% range compared to market price
(Y): VNST will constantly update this value based on real-time market conditions.

redeem.title: Redeem
redeem.covered_amount_tooltip: The remaining amount of USDT support users if the exchange rate experiences price impact beyond the covered price
redeem.covered_price_tooltip:
Supported price range during redeeming mitigate the impact of VMM exchange rate increase beyond X% range compared to market price
(X): VNST will constantly update this value based on real-time market conditions.
redeem.fee_tooltip: The cost for processing USDT redemption transaction

confirm_modal.confirm_transaction_desc: Please sign and approve the transaction through your Wallet
confirm_modal.accept_legal_term: Accept the latest updated Legal Terms of VNST
confirm_modal.loading_desc: {{type}} request is being processed, please wait...

txn_errors.caller_lacks_necessary_permission: Sorry, you have no permission to access this function. Please try again later.
txn_errors.market_price_below_covered_mint_price: The Mint Covered Price is being updated. Please wait a few minutes before you try again, or contact us here.
txn_errors.market_price_above_covered_redeem_price: The Redeem Covered Price is being updated. Please wait a few minutes before you try again, or contact us here.
txn_errors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later!
txn_errors.out_of_covered_mint_amount: Mint covered amount is temporarily unavailable, please wait a few minutes!
txn_errors.out_of_covered_redeem_amount: Redeem covered amount is temporarily unavailable, please wait a few minutes!
txn_errors.chain_miss_match:
Reminder
Please connect to the appropriate network
